contents.text: Thank you for calling Spotinst, your San Francisco-based partner in seamless application scaling and orchestration across any cloud.
For new account inquiries and product demos, press 1.
To schedule a free demo with our solutions team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Spotinst solutions specialist.

navigationGoals: Schedule a quick demo of Spotinst’s application scaling solution
I need to schedule a free demo of your platform for my team.
Schedule a demo of Spotinst’s cloud scaling and orchestration platform.
I’d like someone to walk me through a free demo and help me open a new Spotinst account.
I’d like to schedule a demo to see how Spotinst could optimize my physics research workloads in the cloud.

contents.text: To discuss pricing and enterprise licensing options, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer your call to our Sales department.

navigationGoals: Get details on enterprise pricing and licensing options
I want to get detailed pricing and enterprise licensing info, including any veteran discounts.
Obtain detailed pricing and enterprise licensing options for Spotinst.
I need to speak with someone about pricing and enterprise licensing before I sign up.
I want details on enterprise licensing plans and pricing for a university research project.

contents.text: For existing account support and technical assistance, press 2.
If you need help with your Spotinst integration or technical issues, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a Spotinst integration issue
I need help troubleshooting my Spotinst integration with AWS autoscaling.
Get technical assistance integrating Spotinst with my Kubernetes cluster for auto-scaling.
I’m experiencing an issue with my existing integration and need technical support to fix it.
I need help troubleshooting my Spotinst integration—I'm getting API errors when scaling my compute cluster.

contents.text: For billing inquiries and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Discuss a billing discrepancy on my account
I have questions about my latest invoice and need to update my billing information.
Update my billing details and review recent invoices for my Spotinst account.
I need help understanding my latest bill and making a payment on my account.
I need to review my latest invoice and update my billing information for my Spotinst account.
